name: Overlap (Bazyleeshek)
description:
I recommend downloading the desktop version for better performance

Overlap is a top down shooter inspired by the theme: "failure is progress", made in 3 days  for the Wowie Jam 3.0!

Each death spawns a ghost that repeats everything you did before you died. 
Be careful, though! If you die too many times, you'll have to start over.
In order to win, you'll need help of all five ghosts you can spawn.

Manage your deaths wisely and overcome the challenge!

CONTROLS

WASD / Arrow keys - Movement

LMB - Fire a projectile. You can hold the button to keep shooting.

P - Pause

TOOLS USED

Engine - Unity 2020.2.2f1

Graphics - Aseprite

Sound effects - sfxr
